price: 10. Ma ogin in shar lala maagay waxa jooga dhulka korkiisa, ama in Rabbigood la doonay hanuun toosan.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lā nadrī asharrun urīda biman fī al-arḍi am arāda bihim rabbuhum rashadan
